title: The Cybernetic Watchmaker 1
description: A detailed cinematic portrait combining human warmth with mechanical complexity.
prompt: Cinematic portrait of an elderly cybernetic watchmaker fixing a glowing mechanical eye, intricate details, dramatic lighting, 8k resolution, photorealistic, shallow depth of field, cyberpunk atmosphere, warm tungsten lighting against cool blue background shadows.

title: Rainy Station Sunset 1
description: Emotional anime background art inspired by Makoto Shinkai's signature style.
prompt: Makoto Shinkai style anime background art, a girl standing on a train station platform during a rainy sunset, reflections on wet pavement, vibrant clouds, lens flare, emotional atmosphere, high quality, detailed, anime art style.

title: Iridescent Glass Shapes 1
description: Modern abstract 3D composition featuring glass morphism and soft gradients.
prompt: 3D abstract glass morphism composition, floating geometric shapes with iridescent textures, soft pastel gradients, frosted glass effects, ray tracing, studio lighting, minimal and clean, 4k resolution, 3d render.

title: Lighthouse in the Storm 1
description: Expressive impasto oil painting capturing the raw power of nature.
prompt: Thick impasto oil painting of a stormy ocean crashing against a lighthouse, expressive brushstrokes, palette knife texture, moody dark blue and turquoise colors with foam white highlights, dynamic movement, masterpiece, oil painting style.

title: Neon Cyber City 1
description: Retro-futuristic cityscape in high-detail pixel art style.
prompt: Isometric pixel art of a neon-lit cyberpunk city street at night, rain puddles reflecting pink and blue lights, detailed shops with japanese kanji signs, vending machines, stray cat, 16-bit retro game style, high detail.

title: Floating Dream Island 1
description: Ethereal floating island landscape in soft watercolor.
prompt: Soft pastel watercolor painting of a dreamy floating island with waterfalls cascading into clouds, cherry blossom trees, ethereal atmosphere, wet-on-wet technique, paper texture, delicate brushstrokes, fantasy art.

title: Orbital Space Station 1
description: Grand sci-fi vista of a space station orbiting a blue gas giant.
prompt: Cinematic shot of a massive ring-shaped space station orbiting a blue gas giant planet, intricate mechanical details, realistic lighting, lens flare, starry background, 8k resolution, sci-fi concept art, interstellar movie style.

title: Surreal Desert Chess 1
description: Dreamlike surrealist landscape with giant melting chess pieces.
prompt: Surrealist composition of giant melting chess pieces in a vast red desert, dali style, long shadows, dreamlike atmosphere, mysterious monolithic structures in background, hyperrealistic texture, golden hour lighting.

title: Low Poly Mountains 1
description: Minimalist low poly landscape with vibrant colors.
prompt: Low poly art style landscape of snowy mountains at sunrise, geometric polygons, vibrant orange and purple gradient sky, reflection in a calm polygonal lake, minimal and clean, 3d render style.

title: Paper Cutout Forest 1
description: Whimsical layered paper art of a magical forest.
prompt: Layered paper cut craft art of a magical forest, depth of field, soft warm backlighting, intricate paper details, shadows between layers, whimsical fairy tale atmosphere, pastel colors.

title: Claymorphism Robot Garden 1
description: Cute and friendly 3D clay robot in a tiny garden.
prompt: Cute 3D claymorphism render of a friendly round robot watering flowers in a tiny garden, soft plasticine texture, rounded edges, pastel colors, bright soft lighting, isometric view, high quality 3d art.

title: Ukiyo-e Surfing Cat 1
description: Traditional Japanese woodblock print with a whimsical twist.
prompt: Japanese woodblock print ukiyo-e style of a giant wave with Mount Fuji in background, but a cute cat is surfing on the wave, traditional texture, washi paper grain, vintage colors, detailed linework.

title: Pop Art Astronaut 1
description: Vibrant Andy Warhol style portrait with bold colors.
prompt: Vibrant pop art portrait of an astronaut, Andy Warhol style, bold black outlines, bright solid colors (yellow, pink, cyan), halftone dots pattern, retro comic book aesthetic.

title: Steampunk Blueprint 1
description: Detailed technical schematic of a time machine.
prompt: Detailed technical blueprint schematic of a steampunk time machine, white lines on dark blue background, technical annotations, grid lines, cross-section view, engineering drawing style.

title: Ink Wash China Trend Portrait
prompt: Extreme black-and-white collision aesthetic.Bold heavy ink mass silhouettes for shaping, feibai brushstrokes for freehand expression, while the facial features are rendered with clean, sharp, ultra-fine precise linework.Half-body turning-back glance, large area of “reserved white space” on the right to create spatial depth and atmosphere, pierced through by one strong S-shaped dynamic element (flowing hair / ink traces / fluttering ribbons) that runs across the entire composition, pushing visual tension to the absolute maximum.Signature: Bottom right corner, handwritten signature style reading 「PromptWisp」, using a simple, continuous-stroke black ink pen style — small, restrained, clearly legible, and not overlapping the main subject. No other readable text or duplicate signatures may appear besides this one.Subject: [wukong].
